If anyone's wondering why there's no english translation of this (online for free at least), that's because it was translated and uncensored by an actual company ( https://www.jlist.com/shop-by-brand/j18/j019 )
@Patriot_95 it's animated by studio and the director is Kuramori Rokurou and they didn't have an animation director or an director animation assistant that's why it looked like Queen Bee
@Patriot_95 This one is by studio Seven.

All these years and people still don't know that pinkpineapple isn't a studio, is a publisher. They hire studios to make hentai and they publish it. They have hired studios from t-rex, studio seven, studio 1st, to even queen bee, which are the ones that made the adaptation of this doujin. That's how it is.
For more revenge, there’s this huge list here. https://www.reddit.com/r/netorare/comments/ihn0jz/compilation_of_revengekarmachad_mcguilt/

you all ungrateful af

Yea, I had higher expectations from Pink Pineapple but then, who knows. PP might've been on a tight budget cuz a lot of studios got hit hard by the pandemic. Or perhaps they had an agreement with artist where they will use source material as much as they could (which is similar to how Queen Bee does). Redrawing and making more fluid animations require more work and obviously higher production cost. Still, the bed scene near the end is decent enough to enjoy, imho.

@aimanwhite932 Fortunately for you, it is licensed by PinkPineapple (imo, they produce the best quality hentai so far compared to other) but this time around, the quality is in pair with Queen Bee level of production. So bland and literally 3-4 repetitive loop. Its so terrible i dont even bother watching. Its so far off from what pinkpineapple usually release.
